text: 2.3.Sufficient Conditions for the class $\mathcal { F } _ { \mathcal { L P } }$ . In thepresent investigation,we introduce a class of analytic functions associated with certain parabolic region.In particular,we have considered a case when parabola is lying majorly in the left half plane and symmetric about real axis.The other cases namely,oblique parabolic regions are still open,for similar investigations.
The classes we come across in the present investigation are listed below for the ready reference of the reader.
